findings.title: Extra token fee
findings.description: The function deposit() in MasterChef contract increases pool and user amount not considering tokenâ€™s transfer fee.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions massUpdatePools() uses the loop to update all loops from the poolInfo list and may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a pool addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Various owner privileges in CSWoken, Shares, and MasterChef contracts that could be exploited.
